name: Faerie Mist
description:
Controls: Movement - in  the 4 cardinal directions with WASD

Camera Control - Click on game with mouse, then mouse controls free camera.

NOTE: The free camera can sometimes make grid movement disorienting.

Manipulating camera while standing still is recommended.

5 Total Endings, 25 collectibles, 9 Unique characters to meet, and 4 Unique dialogue 

conversations per character!

My Submission for the January 2021 BitsyJam - The theme for this jam was "Clouds",

which I interpreted as fog and went from there. This was my first project working in 

Bitsy 3D, so I hope you enjoy it!

Faerie Mist is made in Bitsy 3D, a hack of Bitsy.

Music is integrated using BitsyMuse by David Mowatt

Special thanks to Adam Ledoux for Bitsy,  Aloelazoe for Bitsy 3D, David Mowatt for BitsyMuse, and Parallel Dream for music - Agata e le nuvole

Thank you to the Bitsy 3D community for lots of advice, as well as a demo on parent / child tiles. Super useful!

Music edited to loop.
